On Saturday 12th of May the laid back and stunning 20 room boutique Hotel Brummell will open its doors for the second edition of the Brummell Market with 24 brands based in Barcelona, Mallorca and Latvia.

For this special occasion the hotel‚Äôs Lobby, Pool Terrace and The garage by Veronica Blume will transform its space into a market with a selection of clothes, bags, shoes, sunglasses, jewellery, swimwear, perfumes, ceramics and art prints.

The team from Tr√≥pico restaurant will serve a delicious Mexican and Caribbean brunch accompanied by tropical fresh juices and BrewDog's craft beers all day.

The Poble Sec based electronic night club LAUT will very exceptionally convert the Bar into a day club with a selection of local DJs to feast yours ears on.

Live concerts programmed by Cab38B OTO MUSIC HOUSE will sound up the The garage by Veronica Blume with the very talented jazz trio Octavio Bugni Trio and the Argentinian pop folk artist Nina Polverino acclaimed by Billboard, Noisey and Los Inrockuptibles.

And Marset will specially light up the market with a presentation of its collection of unique lamps all designed in Barcelona.

Join Hotel Brummell‚Äôs urban oasis on the 12th of May from 12h to 21h for an exceptional design, gastronomy and musical escape in the heart of Poble Sec.
